caption.title: Emergence of multiple drivers.
caption.p: Combination of stressors that have emerged above the background of seasonal variability by ( a) 2010, ( b) 2030, ( c) 2050 and ( d) 2100 for a ‘business-as-usual' scenario (RCP8.5), based on the model mean ToE estimates shown in Fig. 1. ( e– h) same, but for the mitigation scenario (RCP4.5). In the legend, T refers to SST, PP to primary production and O 2 to interior oxygen concentration.
